Yes I am an indepident, a mountaineer if you will, and I am trying to get hosted. I am currently hosted on Facebook but this is not a very fluid medium. I do not have the openness that I might expect from a texas host. Please allow me to attach another quote of my work. 

I seek to prove that creativity can be taught through education. I want to prove the effectiveness of applying such teaching to our political, social, and educational systems. I have created a system that teaches how creativity is developed. Creativity is developed by learning to understand and use archetypical euphemisms. I am able to teach this system through my poetic writings. The results are felt and can be tested. I have 200 pages of research already created on the subject.

Could you count the number of definitions that you count as meanings for the word count. Consider counting definitions that dont count in the dictionary. Count the creative uses for the word count before reading the below and then again after reading the below. Count your creativity by measuring the ability of a singular verb. Count the creativity of each word. Count the count of creativity countered by countless counts of counting colaborations.

Count yourself as counted in for calculus minus the calculations. Countless counters continue to count the coins resting on their counters. Could the counters refer to banks you may wonder? Counters could be anything that counts anything technically. Count on me to count you in when I write my rhymes. Could the counters coin faster so that the counter in the counties of America could count on a retirement check? Count on the count to continue forever unless we count ourselves together. Counting countless accounts of accounting counting committee?s could count as a count of stalking in a legal court if you you?re counting the accountants through a peep hole. 

Count on me to count for you if you count up a labority for me to use. I will count the continiousely counting counters, the counting counts, untill the counters are counting on me to count along with them.
